page.title: 08Stithians Parish Council.
page.content: The Parish Council which has eleven elected members meets on the first Monday of each month. The public can attend as observers. The Council tries to make improvements e.g. in street lighting and providing litter bins. It maintains the playing fields and public footpaths. Much of the work of the parish council e.g. the conditions of the roads is passed on to the county council. They would like more people to take interest in the village and would attend the meetings. They would also like more people to write letters to them. The work of the council is going to be helped by a newly formed residents association which will be able to raise its own money for things it wants to do, something the parish council can't do.
